name: Five Secrets
description:
A gentle afternoon ritual, summoning your grandmother who passed away some years ago. If you can figure out the four rules, you can see her one more time. Each object carries its own significance, both to you personally, and to the summoning ritual.

Controls: Click and drag objects.

Theme of Balance: Two of the rules explicitly require balance, while the two others combine to form a balanced aesthetic in the arrangement of the objects.

Accessibility: With no time pressure, simple controls, and unnecessary but simply-worded language, this game is ideal for a player of any age who has the patience and curiosity to solve a quiet puzzle.
